listitem.para:
DataModel _dataModel
<summary> A model of the data. Self sufficient. </summary>

Form_Confirm Confirmation
<summary> Stub for Form 2 to be accessed once it is opened. </summary>

readonly Timer _itemSelectionChangedTimer
<summary> a Timer to keep track of the selected line, prevents clicking too fast (timeout)</summary>

const int SELECTION_TIMEOUT
<summary> Timeout in ms for ListView selection-box's repeat mouse click rejection </summary>

void Form_Main_Load ( object sender, EventArgs e)
<summary> After the InitializeComponent() loads the designer, the designer will fire an event handler signifying its done loading</summary>

void Form_Main_Run ( )
<summary> At this point we can run our code (that wants to interact with our designer GUI). </summary>
void menuItem_FileOpen_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void menuItem_FileExit_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void menuItem_HelpContents_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void menuItem_HelpAbout_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)

void menuItem_Preferences_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
<summary> Create and initialize preferences </summary>
void label1_CreationDate_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void label2_ModifiedDate_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void label3_AccessDate_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void tabControl1_Selected ( object sender, TabControlEventArgs e)
void tabControl1_MouseHover ( object sender, EventArgs e)

void ItemSelectionChangedTimer_Tick ( object sender, EventArgs e)
<summary> Timer Event function. Used to prevent the currently selected Textboxes for the 3 Times from blanking when an item selection is changed. Assosciated with listView_Contents_ItemSelectionChanged() — Fires after some delay (SELECTION_TIMEOUT ms) and if there still is nothing selected, calls CallDisplayCma(). </summary>

void listView_Contents_ItemSelectionChanged ( object sender, ListViewItemSelectionChangedEventArgs e)
<summary> The Contents listview (right) selection has changed. Timer-based solution - block re-selection within SELECTION_TIMEOUTms </summary>

void checkBox_DateTime_CheckedChanged ( object sender, EventArgs e)
<summary> Creation,Modified,Accessed Checkbox selection changed. Only enable the update button if something is selected </summary>

void explorerTree1_PathChanged ( object sender, EventArgs e)
<summary> Update the textlabel box for FilePath when the Explorer Tree path changes. (making sure it always ends in a \ seperator). Also causes a re-render of Contents! </summary>

BoolCMA QueryCMAcheckboxes ( )
<summary> Return the value of the checkboxes "CMA Time" </summary>
void checkBox_Recurse_CheckedChanged ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void checkBoxShouldFiles_CheckedChanged ( object sender, EventArgs e)

void ClearOnError ( )
<summary> Clear both ListViews and the three data container lists, blanks the selected date, and erases the top current dir textbox. </summary>

void DisplayCma ( string path)
<summary> Display file's times in the Tri-Textbox bottom UI for the currently selected file. </summary>

void CallDisplayCma ( ListView listViewContents, string srcPath)
<summary> Update the GUI - Display the DateTime for the currently selected file. Calls DisplayCma </summary>
void button_Browse_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)
void button_Update_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)

void StartUpMode3 ( string targetPath, string comparePath)
<summary> Mode 3. Recursive, file Tree time compare mode. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-compare-the-contents-of-two-folders-linq </summary>

void PrepareDataModelForUse ( )
<summary> Resets the files-to-confirm list, Skips count, reads GUIstatus data (radios), reads CMA checkboxes (lazy/dupe gui fields) </summary>

void StartUpBothModes1And2 ( int mode2, string startingdir)
<summary> Launches Mode 1 and Mode 2. This runs a LONG process on the folders/files. It decides which time to use, then adds them to the confirm list to be handled by the form_confirm window (part2). Cant move into the model. This is a nice staging point place for making EVERYTHING happen. </summary>

void LaunchForm2Go ( )
<summary> Show files to be changed in the confirmation window (Show Form 2) </summary>
void label_folderCompareRadioButton_Click ( object sender, EventArgs e)

void InitializeComponent ( )
<summary> Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor. </summary>

void RefreshDataBinding_labelFPath ( )
<summary> The Text Box Data Binding is rebound. </summary>

void RefreshContentsRightPanel ( )
<summary> Wrapper for DisplayContentsList that manages imageList and listView resources automatically. TODO: Can be moved to model later. </summary>

override void Dispose ( bool disposing)
<summary> Clean up any resources being used. </summary>

simplesect.para: GUI : Main Form Window of the Program.
